mapper.select: select * from( select row_number() over (order by p_id asc) as num, p_id, pt_id, p_name, p_cont, p_img, p_view from party where pt_id = #{pt_id}) where num = #{num}
select a.p_id as p_id, b.i_id as i_id, b.it_id as it_it, b.i_name as i_name, b.i_cont as i_cont from PARTYITEM a, ITEM b where a.i_id = b.i_id and a.p_id=#{p_id}
select row_number() over (order by p_id asc) as num, p_id, pt_id, p_name, p_cont, p_img, p_view from party where pt_id=#{pt_id}
